Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1, N1:term
M2:list term
red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N1 -> red1 Œ£ Œì (tApp M1 M2) (mkApps N1 M2)


Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1, N1:term
M2:list term
red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N1 -> red1 Œ£ Œì (tApp M1 M2) (mkApps N1 M2)
 
Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1, N1:term
M2:list term
X:red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N1
red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N1
 auto. Qed.


Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1, N1, M2:term
red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N1 ->
red1 Œ£ Œì (tApp M1 [M2]) (mkApp N1 M2)


Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1, N1, M2:term
red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N1 ->
red1 Œ£ Œì (tApp M1 [M2]) (mkApp N1 M2)

Œì:context
M1, N1, M2:term
X:red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N1
red1 Œ£ Œì (tApp M1 [M2]) (mkApp N1 M2)

  
Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1, N1, M2:term
X:red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N1
red1 Œ£ Œì (tApp M1 [M2]) (mkApps N1 [M2])

  
Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1, N1, M2:term
X:red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N1
red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N1
 auto.
Qed.


Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1, N1, M2:term
Ast.wf M1 ->
red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N1 -> red1 Œ£ Œì (mkApp M1 M2) (mkApp N1 M2)


Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1, N1, M2:term
Ast.wf M1 ->
red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N1 -> red1 Œ£ Œì (mkApp M1 M2) (mkApp N1 M2)

  
Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1, N1, M2:term
wfM1:Ast.wf M1
H:red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N1
red1 Œ£ Œì (mkApp M1 M2) (mkApp N1 M2)

  
Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1, N1, M2:term
wfM1:Ast.wf M1
H:red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N1
Heq:isApp M1 = true
red1 Œ£ Œì (mkApp M1 M2) (mkApp N1 M2)
Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1, N1, M2:term
wfM1:Ast.wf M1
H:red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N1
Heq:isApp M1 = false
red1 Œ£ Œì (mkApp M1 M2) (mkApp N1 M2)

  
Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1:term
args:list term
N1, M2:term
wfM1:Ast.wf (tApp M1 args)
H:red1 Œ£ Œì (tApp M1 args) N1
Heq:isApp (tApp M1 args) = true
red1 Œ£ Œì (mkApp (tApp M1 args) M2) (mkApp N1 M2)
Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1, N1, M2:term
wfM1:Ast.wf M1
H:red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N1
Heq:isApp M1 = false
red1 Œ£ Œì (mkApp M1 M2) (mkApp N1 M2)

Œì:context

args:list term
N1, M2:term

Heq:isApp (tApp M1 args) = true
red1 Œ£ Œì (tApp M1 (args ++ [M2])) (mkApp N1 M2)

Œì:context

Heq:isApp M1 = false

Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1:term
args:list term
N1, M2:term
Heq:isApp (tApp M1 args) = true
na:aname
t, b, a:term
l:list term
Ast.wf (tApp (tLambda na t b) (a :: l)) ->
red1 Œ£ Œì (tApp (tLambda na t b) ((a :: l) ++ [M2]))
  (mkApp (mkApps (b {0 := a}) l) M2)
Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1:term
args:list term
N1, M2:term
Heq:isApp (tApp M1 args) = true
mfix:mfixpoint term
idx, narg:nat
fn:term
H0:unfold_fix mfix idx = Some (narg, fn)
H1:is_constructor narg args = true
Ast.wf (tApp (tFix mfix idx) args) ->
red1 Œ£ Œì (tApp (tFix mfix idx) (args ++ [M2]))
  (mkApp (mkApps fn args) M2)
Œ£:global_env
Œì:context
M1:term
args:list term
N1, M2:term
Heq:isApp (tApp M1 args) = true
N0:term
X:red1 Œ£ Œì M1 N0
Ast.wf (tApp M1 args) ->
red1 Œ£ Œì (tApp M1 (args ++ [M2]))
  (mkApp (mkApps N0 args) M2)

Œì:context

N2:list term

args:list term
M2:term
narg:nat
H1:match nth_error args narg with
| Some a => isConstruct_app a
| None => false
end = true
match nth_error (args ++ [M2]) narg with
| Some a => isConstruct_app a
| None => false
end = true
